abstract: Returns an asset track from which you can insert any time range into a given composition track.
overview:
## Return Value

An asset track managed by the asset from which any time range can be inserted into a given composition track.

## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load compatible tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAsset/findCompatibleTrack(for:completionHandler:)] instead.

This method is the logical complement of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableComposition/mutableTrack(compatibleWith:)].

# compatibleTrack(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an asset track from which you can insert any time range into a given composition track.

## Declaration

```swift
func compatibleTrack(for compositionTrack: AVCompositionTrack) -> AVAssetTrack?
```

## Parameters

- **compositionTrack**: The composition track.

## Return Value

An asset track managed by the asset from which any time range can be inserted into a given composition track.

## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load compatible tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAsset/findCompatibleTrack(for:completionHandler:)] instead.

This method is the logical complement of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableComposition/mutableTrack(compatibleWith:)].
title: compatibleTrack(for:)
